name: Get the Rabbits!
description:
I did this game for a game jam. After six hours making this game and recording the process on a live YouTube video, I decided to not submit the game to the Jam.

You control a hat with the mouse.

The "C" key changes the hat's color. You can only get the rabbits with the same current color of the hat. If the hat collides with a rabbit which color is different than the hat's color, then its game over, then you can decide with you want to restart the level or the game.
